metadata.description: "Every night, he would call to ensure I was safe. Now we are adults; he will even come pick me up. Always, at precisely 10 o'clock." As someone who only fancies cute guys, the high school teacher Wataru Chinen's first love was a 'miscalculation.' He never thought that his lovely childhood friend, Ryusei Yamaguchi will turn into a capable adult man, leaving all his youthful innocent-ness. When Ryusei confessed, "I've always wanted to hold you," with his domineering eyes, Wataru couldn't say a word.
metadata.name: The 10 O'clock Rule (Yaoi Manga)
